%vlocity_namespace%__PropertySet__c.label: Requirements to complete this application
%vlocity_namespace%__PropertySet__c.text:
Requirements to complete this application

 

1      You need to provide personal information such as address, date of birth, and social security number for

         anyone applying for coverage. You will also need to provide proof of Idaho residency. Please have this

         information ready before you begin the application.

2      You will need to pay the first month's premium to complete your application. Please be ready to supply a

         credit card, debit card or checking account information.

3       For security purposes, any entered information or changes will be lost if you navigate out of or close your

         browser before completing your application.

What will I need to complete this application?

Accept Terms & Conditions

 

The following Terms and Conditions govern your use of the Vlocity on-line application. The Terms and

Conditions do not replace, but are a supplement to the Legal Disclaimer on the Vlocity Web site. Please

read the Terms and Conditions carefully so you fully understand your rights and responsibilities.

Information Collected

We may collect applicant information from you such as name, gender, address, phone number, fax number,

email address, member number, date of birth, Social Security Number, health plan, treating physician(s),

diagnosis, date(s) of service, treatment, prescriptions prescribed and/or any other information we need to verify

who you are or to determine what information may be made available to you.

Access to Information

You will not allow any other person or user to have access to the information contained in the online application

unless the person's access is consistent with applicable state and federal laws. All passwords used to access the

online application must be kept confidential. If you believe that a password has become known to someone

else, contact Vlocity via Email or via phone at 208-387-6683 or 800-274-4018 to report the issue and

obtain a new password.

Security

Information transmitted to Vlocity via the online application is secured with 128-bit encryption and the

information communicated will not leave our private network. Although Vlocity has security measures

in place, we cannot guarantee that unauthorized users will not gain unauthorized access to your information or

otherwise misuse the system. You assume all risks associated with using the online application and release

Vlocity from any claim, liability and/or damages, as a result of your use of the online application.

If any provision of these Terms and Conditions is determined to be invalid, all other provisions will remain in full

force and effect. These Terms and Conditions shall be interpreted and enforced according to the laws of the

State of Vlocity
